alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 12 at 3:18PM PDT until April 13 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures ranging from 28 to 31 expected. * WHERE...Northern Lake County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.
